content:
Can anyone tell me where the share/db folder is located in a windows computer.

@Akshit Goel try not to mix up topics, select a stream and topic that match your question or create a new one like I did now for you.

Rahil's answer is correct when BRL-CAD was build from source.
When you have installed a binary package, the share\db folder is somewhere like C:\Program Files\BRLCAD 7.26.4\share\db.
